thread.title: Sushin Shyam happy composing BGM for 'LL&K'
thread.title_full: Sushin Shyam happy composing BGM for 'LL&K' - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Sushin Shyam happy composing BGM for 'LL&K'
text:
Sushin Shyam who had earlier composed background score for Sapthamashree Thaskaraha is now enjoying the appreciation that he is receiving for his latest movie, Lord Livingstone 7000 Kandi.
In a recent interview he said that he have tried to apply some different sound to BGM by using foreign instruments as well as vintage instruments.
